tool_plan.objective: Determine one choice to recommend (ex-post blind) for the Aave proposal based on full voting data, timeline analysis, and on-chain holder distribution/concentration.

calls.why: To fetch the full proposal metadata including start and end timestamps necessary for timeline and on-chain analysis.
To analyze the voting timeline and participation metrics based on the full votes and proposal voting period.
To compute total holders and top-100 holder distribution/concentration for the governance token during the proposal period.

tool_plan.notes: Votes sample provided is partial; full votes fetch is mandatory as per instructions before timeline analysis.

decision.summary: The proposal to launch GHO on Ink and set ACI as Emissions Manager received unanimous support in the analyzed votes with all voting power in favor. Despite lacking on-chain holder distribution data, the voting timeline shows strong and early participation for the 'For' option.
key_arguments_for: Unanimous voting power support for 'For' choice in the timeline analysis.
Proposal aligns with Aave governance interests as discussed in the official governance forum.
key_arguments_against: No votes recorded against the proposal in the analyzed data.

evidence.quote: Proposal titled '[ARFC] Launch GHO on Ink & set ACI as Emissions Manager for Rewards', choices: ['For', 'Against', 'Abstain'], start: 1755756186, end: 1756015386
All votes (3) cast for 'For' choice with total voting power ~0.6

decision.simulation_reason: On-chain holder distribution and concentration metrics unavailable due to tool execution failure; vote data indicates strong support.
